targets.rawSql:
WITH baseline_data AS (
  SELECT 
    COUNT(*) as total_vulns,
    SUM(CASE WHEN v.severity = 'CRITICAL' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as critical,
    SUM(CASE WHEN v.severity = 'HIGH' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as high
  FROM vulnerabilities v
  JOIN scans s ON v.scan_id = s.id
  JOIN images i ON v.image_id = i.id
  WHERE s.id IN (
    SELECT MAX(id) FROM scans WHERE scan_status = 'completed' AND image_variant = 'baseline' GROUP BY image_id
  ) AND i.image_variant = 'baseline'
  AND (NULLIF('${package_category:raw}', 'All') IS NULL OR v.package_category = '${package_category}')
),
chainguard_data AS (
  SELECT 
    COUNT(*) as total_vulns,
    SUM(CASE WHEN v.severity = 'CRITICAL' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as critical,
    SUM(CASE WHEN v.severity = 'HIGH' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as high
  FROM vulnerabilities v
  JOIN scans s ON v.scan_id = s.id
  JOIN images i ON v.image_id = i.id
  WHERE s.id IN (
    SELECT MAX(id) FROM scans WHERE scan_status = 'completed' AND image_variant = 'chainguard' GROUP BY image_id
  ) AND i.image_variant = 'chainguard'
  AND (NULLIF('${package_category:raw}', 'All') IS NULL OR v.package_category = '${package_category}')
),
remediation_calc AS (
  SELECT 
    (b.total_vulns - c.total_vulns) as vulns_remediated,
    (b.critical - c.critical) as critical_remediated,
    (b.high - c.high) as high_remediated
  FROM baseline_data b, chainguard_data c
)
SELECT 
  'Cost Savings' as "ROI Category",
  'Engineering time saved from vulnerability remediation' as "Description",
  vulns_remediated || ' vulnerabilities' as "Metric",
  '$' || TO_CHAR((vulns_remediated * 4 * 150)::numeric, 'FM999,999,999') as "Value",
  'Assumes 4 hours per CVE at $150/hour developer cost' as "Calculation"
FROM remediation_calc
UNION ALL
SELECT 
  'Risk Reduction' as "ROI Category",
  'Reduced security incident and breach risk' as "Description",
  critical_remediated || ' critical + ' || high_remediated || ' high vulns' as "Metric",
  '$' || TO_CHAR(((critical_remediated * 50000) + (high_remediated * 10000))::numeric, 'FM999,999,999') as "Value",
  'Critical: $50k risk each, High: $10k risk each' as "Calculation"
FROM remediation_calc
UNION ALL
SELECT 
  'Compliance & Speed' as "ROI Category",
  'Faster deployment cycles and compliance posture' as "Description",
  'Reduced audit overhead' as "Metric",
  'Qualitative' as "Value",
  'Easier certifications (SOC2, FedRAMP, etc.)' as "Calculation"
FROM remediation_calc;

panels.title: ROI Analysis - Business Value of Chainguard Images

targets.rawSql:
WITH baseline_data AS (
  SELECT 
    SUM(CASE WHEN v.severity = 'CRITICAL' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as critical,
    SUM(CASE WHEN v.severity = 'HIGH' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as high
  FROM vulnerabilities v
  JOIN scans s ON v.scan_id = s.id
  JOIN images i ON v.image_id = i.id
  WHERE s.id IN (
    SELECT MAX(id) FROM scans WHERE scan_status = 'completed' AND image_variant = 'baseline' GROUP BY image_id
  ) AND i.image_variant = 'baseline'
  AND (NULLIF('${package_category:raw}', 'All') IS NULL OR v.package_category = '${package_category}')
),
chainguard_data AS (
  SELECT 
    SUM(CASE WHEN v.severity = 'CRITICAL' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as critical,
    SUM(CASE WHEN v.severity = 'HIGH' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as high
  FROM vulnerabilities v
  JOIN scans s ON v.scan_id = s.id
  JOIN images i ON v.image_id = i.id
  WHERE s.id IN (
    SELECT MAX(id) FROM scans WHERE scan_status = 'completed' AND image_variant = 'chainguard' GROUP BY image_id
  ) AND i.image_variant = 'chainguard'
  AND (NULLIF('${package_category:raw}', 'All') IS NULL OR v.package_category = '${package_category}')
),
remediation_calc AS (
  SELECT 
    (b.critical - c.critical) as critical_remediated,
    (b.high - c.high) as high_remediated
  FROM baseline_data b, chainguard_data c
)
SELECT 
  (
    -- Cost Savings: remediation time at $150/hour, 4 hours per vuln
    ((critical_remediated + high_remediated) * 4 * 150) +
    -- Risk Reduction: Critical=$50k, High=$10k per vuln
    (critical_remediated * 50000) +
    (high_remediated * 10000)
  ) as "Total ROI (Critical & High Only)"
FROM remediation_calc;

list.description: Filter by package category (OS, Application, Binary, Unknown)
list.label: Package Category
list.name: package_category
list.query: All : All, OS : os, Language : application, Binary : binary, Unknown : unknown
